summary: The young editor-in-chief of a fashion magazine must divorce from her ex unbeknownst to her current beau, who just proposed to her.
cast: Alain Delon|Alexandre Varga|Philippe Bas|Jean-Luc Bideau|Cyrielle Clair|Scali Delpeyrat|Marie Boissard|Valérie Decobert-Koretzky|Vincent Nemeth|Bruno Flender|Cyril Dubreuil|Jean-Baptiste Shelmerdine|Franck Adrien|Anne Cart|Audrey Hamm|Mauricette Laurence|Leslie Coutterand|Olivier Valverde|Jean-Louis Andrieux|Martine Borg|Jean-Georges Brunet|Laurent Bruzon|Karine Ventalon|Alexandra Michel|Rémy Gence|Eric Gallienne|Elodie Hachet|Cédric Maruani|Marie-Sophie Lefort|Marie-Caroline Lefort|Lorie Pester
title: Un mari de trop
